page.title: 19RELIGION A WAY OF LIFE
page.content: Religion is mostly traditional. There is a Protestant church in each village St. Nicholas', a Tudor church in Hulcote and the l3th century St.Mary the Virgin in Salford. The minister lives in Cranfield. During each month there are three services held at Salford one of which is a Family Service specifically for younger members of the congregation who attend with their parents. Hulcote holds a Communion Service once a month. Services for Harvest Festival and Christmas Nativity are held in the evenings and are well attended. At other times of the year a dedicated core of worshippers attend regularly. Roman Catholic worshippers attend the church at Woburn Sands three miles away.
